name: Umbral (Serafín Álvarez)
description:
Umbral is an island that can be freely explored, wandering aimlessly and contemplatively through its different environments.

http://umbral.world

A project by Serafín Álvarez

In collaboration with BaseTIS (CGI and programming) and Carlos Fdez. Rovira (landscape architecture)

With the support of Generaciones 2018 - Fundación Montemadrid
